snippet: It appears Deutsche Telekom has finally settled on its response to queries about whether it will raise a bid by its T-Mobile USA subsidiary for MetroPCS. And that answer is, “No comment.”
abstract: It appears Deutsche Telekom has finally settled on its response to queries about whether it will raise a bid by its T-Mobile USA subsidiary for MetroPCS. And that answer is, “No comment.”

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Deutsche Telekom Walks Back Prior Statement on Sweetening MetroPCS Bid
